en-US.name: ThinkRank: AI Research Games
en-US.subtitle: Make research decisions with confidence
en-US.description:
Make complex research decisions with confidence using ThinkRank's AI-powered analysis tools.

Transform uncertainty into clarity with our advanced bias detection and context evaluation system. Whether you're evaluating research papers, analyzing data sources, or making critical decisions, ThinkRank provides the insights you need to choose wisely.

üîç AI-POWERED ANALYSIS

Download ThinkRank now and make every research decision informed and confident.

appReviewInformation.notes:
ThinkRank is a research-focused gaming platform that contributes to AI safety research. The app includes:

1. Educational games based on real AI research problems
2. Social features for collaborative research
3. Subscription model for premium features
4. All research contributions are reviewed by experts
5. No user-generated content that requires moderation
6. Appropriate for ages 13+ due to complex subject matter

Demo account provides access to all features. The app requires internet connection for research data synchronization.
